page.title: 10Home Life 1(continued).
page.content: After breakfast I helped Dad to fill up the oil pump in the tractor. Some of the oil went into his eyes and he had to go up to the house to wash the oil out. After that we had sandwiches and a yogurt for dinner. In the afternoon we braised the fuel pipe of the tractor, put it back on the tractor and then we washed it. Before tea I did some side_raking with the hay-turner and the 135, a Massey Ferguson tractor. After tea we brought the hogs down from the Heather Hill to be clipped during the next day.After that I fed Kevie and checked the sheep again. At 9.30p.m. I went to bed.
